summary: Completed frontend testing of FleetDashboard.js refactoring. All 5 extracted components (JobCard, JobDetailDialog, FleetDialogs, StatCard, index.js) are working correctly. The refactoring successfully reduced FleetDashboard.js from 1540 lines to 663 lines while maintaining all existing functionality.
passed_tests: Fleet Dashboard loads correctly with refactored components - PASS
StatCard component displays stats correctly (Total Jobs, New Jobs, In Progress, Completed) - PASS
JobCard component displays all job information (ref, status, price, date/time, locations, driver info) - PASS
JobCard tracking link section shows Copy/Email/Open buttons when driver is assigned - PASS
JobDetailDialog opens and displays Job Details tab correctly - PASS
JobDetailDialog Tracking tab shows 'No Driver Assigned' message when no driver - PASS
JobDetailDialog Comments tab shows comment input and existing comments - PASS
DriverDialog opens with all fields (Name, Phone, Email, License, Expiry, Status) - PASS
VehicleDialog opens with all fields (Plate, Make, Model, Year, Color, Category, Capacity, Status) - PASS
AssignDriverDialog shows job info and driver/vehicle selection - PASS
AssignDriverDialog shows 'Setup Required' warning when no drivers/vehicles available - PASS
List/Calendar view toggle works correctly - PASS
Calendar view shows jobs on correct dates with job count badges - PASS
Search functionality filters jobs by location/ref - PASS
Filters panel shows all filter options (Status, Date range, Driver, Vehicle Type) - PASS
Fleet impersonation from Admin panel works correctly - PASS
Impersonation mode banner displays with Exit button - PASS
My Drivers tab shows driver list or empty state - PASS
My Vehicles tab shows vehicle list or empty state - PASS
Component imports from /components/fleet/index.js work correctly - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings for missing useEffect dependencies in JobDetailDialog.js (lines 29, 37) - these are common React patterns and don't affect functionality
ESLint warning for missing useEffect dependencies in FleetDashboard.js (line 92) - same pattern, doesn't affect functionality
All components properly use data-testid attributes for testing
API calls correctly use REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL from environment
Component exports are properly organized in index.js barrel file
context_for_next_testing_agent: FleetDashboard.js refactoring is complete and all components are working. The following components were extracted: JobCard (job card display with tracking), JobDetailDialog (job details with tabs), FleetDialogs (DriverDialog, VehicleDialog, AssignDriverDialog), StatCard (stats display). All components are exported from /app/frontend/src/components/fleet/index.js. Fleet impersonation can be tested by logging in as admin@aircabio.com, navigating to Fleets tab, and clicking Login As on an active fleet.

JobCard_component.description: Displays job information with status badge, price, date/time, locations, driver assignment, and tracking link actions

JobDetailDialog_component.description: Modal dialog with 3 tabs: Job Details (passenger, trip, assignment info), Tracking (driver location/status), Comments (notes)

FleetDialogs_component.description: Contains DriverDialog (CRUD for drivers), VehicleDialog (CRUD for vehicles), AssignDriverDialog (assign driver/vehicle to job)

StatCard_component.description: Displays stat cards with title, value, icon, and color

list_calendar_toggle.description: Toggle between list view and calendar view of jobs

search_and_filters.description: Search jobs by text, filter by status/date/driver/vehicle type

fleet_impersonation.description: Admin can impersonate fleet to view their dashboard
